channel.title: Project Destiny 459
channel.description:
Project Destiny was one of the greatest servers, I can safely say, of all time for a while. Now, after years and years of programming experience, I've returned to start up another server. Similarly to a previous Project Destiny, this server will be based upon Draynor. The rate of experience is neither low nor high. I'd say the rate it is at currently is perfect for a private server.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=projdestiny.no-ip.org
[U][B]Features:[/B][/U] Magic (Lunar, Ancient, Regular complete) Melee Ranged (All bows, special attacks, and arrows working) Prayer (All of them work) Woodcutting Fishing Mining Smithing Thieving Cooking Firemaking Fletching Crafting Clipped following Autocast for magic Shops Trading Dueling
[U][B]Media:[/B][/U] Thieving, main source of income. [IMG]http://img522.imageshack.us/img522/6167/29180363.png[/img]
Fishing, including harpooning, lobster fishing, baiting, and netting. [IMG]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/5581/66113043.png[/img]
Woodcutting, all types of trees and all types of axes. [IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/3721/82564555.png[/img]
Combat - very close to perfect, you'll see when you try. [IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/106/45567015.png[/img]
Cooking, can cook anything and everything that you can in real RuneScape. [IMG]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/2242/72039975.png[/img]

item.title: Project Destiny 459
item.dc:creator: @shiver1 shiver_
item.description:
@shiver1 wrote:

Project Destiny was one of the greatest servers, I can safely say, of all time for a while.
Now, after years and years of programming experience, I’ve returned to start up another server. Similarly to a previous Project Destiny, this server will be based upon Draynor.
The rate of experience is neither low nor high. I’d say the rate it is at currently is perfect for a private server.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=projdestiny.no-ip.org

Features:
Magic (Lunar, Ancient, Regular complete)
Melee
Ranged (All bows, special attacks, and arrows working)
Prayer (All of them work)
Woodcutting
Fishing
Mining
Smithing
Thieving
Cooking
Firemaking
Fletching
Crafting
Clipped following
Autocast for magic
Shops
Trading
Dueling

Media:
Thieving, main source of income.

Fishing, including harpooning, lobster fishing, baiting, and netting.

Woodcutting, all types of trees and all types of axes.

Combat - very close to perfect, you’ll see when you try.

Cooking, can cook anything and everything that you can in real RuneScape.

Read full topic
